price: (Bazaba bafite ubwiza) nk’ubw’amabuye y’agaciro ya Yaquut na[1] Marjani.
footnotes: [1] Yaaquut: Ni bumwe mu bwoko bw’amabuye y’agaciro rifite ibara ritukura ryererutse.

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.
